panels.description: Total requests to all of your APIs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*) AS count
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  LogAttributes['status_code'] IN ($status_code) AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
ORDER BY
  count Desc
limit
  20

panels.title: Total requests in this period

panels.description: Total active users in this period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(DISTINCT(LogAttributes['user_id']) as userId) as userCount
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  LogAttributes['status_code'] IN ($status_code) AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri)
limit
  20

panels.title: Total active users

panels.description: User error count in this period (4xx status codes)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*) AS count
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  CAST(LogAttributes['status_code'] AS INT) >= 400 AND CAST(LogAttributes['status_code'] AS INT) < 500 AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
ORDER BY
  count Desc
limit
  20

panels.title: User error count

panels.description: Server error count in this period (5xx status codes)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*) AS count
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  CAST(LogAttributes['status_code'] AS INT) >= 500 AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
ORDER BY
  count Desc
limit
  20

panels.title: Server error count

panels.description: Usage for API '$api_id' with usage plan '$usage_plan'

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(LogAttributes['user_id'] AS VARCHAR) as User,
  count(*) AS Count
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  LogAttributes['status_code'] IN ($status_code) AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
GROUP BY
  User
ORDER BY
  Count Desc

panels.title: Top API consumers

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
  LogAttributes['api_id'] AS apiId,
  count(*) AS count
FROM 
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  LogAttributes['status_code'] IN ($status_code) AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
GROUP BY 
  apiId, 
  time
ORDER BY 
  time ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
  LogAttributes['status_code'] AS statusCode,
  count(*) as count
FROM 
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IN ($api_id) AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  LogAttributes['status_code'] IN ($status_code) AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
GROUP BY 
  statusCode, 
  time
ORDER BY 
  time ASC

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.25)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p25
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.5)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p50
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.75)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p75
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.90)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p90
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.95)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p95
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.99)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p99
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(Timestamp) AS time,
    quantileExact(0.999)(CAST(LogAttributes['response_duration'] AS INT)) as p999
FROM
    gloo_api_logs
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.description: Total requests in this period for the API '$api_id'

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  LogAttributes['api_id'] as apiId,
  count(*) AS count
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] = '$api_id' AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IN ($usage_plan) AND
  LogAttributes['status_code'] IN ($status_code) AND
  LogAttributes['request_command'] IN ($http_method) AND
  LogAttributes['request_uri'] IN ($request_uri) AND
  ('$user_id' = 'All' OR LogAttributes['user_id'] = '$user_id')
GROUP BY
  apiId
ORDER BY
  count Desc
limit
  20

list.definition:
Select DISTINCT (LogAttributes['api_id'])
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IS NOT NULL AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] != '' AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] != '<nil>'
list.label: Api ID
list.name: api_id
list.query:
Select DISTINCT (LogAttributes['api_id'])
FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  LogAttributes['api_id'] IS NOT NULL AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] != '' AND
  LogAttributes['api_id'] != '<nil>'

list.definition:

FROM
  gloo_api_logs
WHERE
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] IS NOT NULL AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] != '' AND
  LogAttributes['usage_plan'] != '<nil>'

list.definition: select distinct(LogAttributes['status_code']) as statusCode from gloo_api_logs
list.label: Status Code
list.name: status_code
list.query: select distinct(LogAttributes['status_code']) as statusCode from gloo_api_logs

list.definition:
select distinct(LogAttributes['user_id']) as userId from gloo_api_logs
where userId like '$filter_users%' AND userId != '<nil>'
LIMIT 100
list.label: User ID
list.name: user_id
list.query:
select distinct(LogAttributes['user_id']) as userId from gloo_api_logs
where userId like '$filter_users%' AND userId != '<nil>'
LIMIT 100
